Client

Class communicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • Client.communicator

  • public class communicator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class communicates with the server and perform operations requested by the client
    Author:
    Yazan Halawa

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      communicator()
      The constructor for the client.communicator class

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DownloadBatch_Result downloadBatch(DownloadBatch_Params params)
      This method validates the user first then accesses the batches table and finds the matching project Id and selects the first available batch and returns the information of that batch then accesses the Fields table and returns information related to the field which the batch resides in.
      GetFields_Result getFields(GetFields_Params params)
      This method validates the user first then accesses the fields table and returns the information about the fields relating to the specified project.
      GetProjects_Result getProjects(GetProjects_Params params)
      This method validates the user first then accesses the projects table in the data base and gets information about all available projects.
      GetSampleImage_Result getSampleImage(GetSampleImage_Params params)
      This method validates the user first then accesses the batches table and finds the matching project Id and selects the first batch
      Search_Result search(Search_Params params)
      This method validates the user first then searches the indexed records for the specified strings in the specified fields.
      SubmitBatch_Result submitBatch(SubmitBatch_Params params)
      This method validates the user first then accesses the users table and unassigns the user from the submitted batch by incrementing the number of records indexed and updating the currentBatchID to the default value.
      ValidateUser_Result validateUser(ValidateUser_Params params)
      This method accesses the Users table and uses the select operation on the data base to check if the user exists and grab its information if it does

    • Constructor Detail

      • communicator

        public communicator()
        The constructor for the client.communicator class

    • Method Detail

      • validateUser

        public ValidateUser_Result validateUser(ValidateUser_Params params)
        This method accesses the Users table and uses the select operation on the data base to check if the user exists and grab its information if it does
        Parameters:
        params - a VaildateUser_Params object which contains the User's name and password.
        Returns:
        the user's information if he exists, else False if he does not exist, else a failed string if the operation fails for any reason.

      • getProjects

        public GetProjects_Result getProjects(GetProjects_Params params)
        This method validates the user first then accesses the projects table in the data base and gets information about all available projects.
        Parameters:
        params - a GetProjects_Params object which contains the user name and password
        Returns:
        the title and id for every available project, else returns a failed string if the operation fails

      • getSampleImage

        public GetSampleImage_Result getSampleImage(GetSampleImage_Params params)
        This method validates the user first then accesses the batches table and finds the matching project Id and selects the first batch
        Parameters:
        params - a GetSampleImage_Params object which contains the user name and password and the target project id
        Returns:
        the batch's URL, else a failed string if the operation fails for any reason

      • downloadBatch

        public DownloadBatch_Result downloadBatch(DownloadBatch_Params params)
        This method validates the user first then accesses the batches table and finds the matching project Id and selects the first available batch and returns the information of that batch then accesses the Fields table and returns information related to the field which the batch resides in. Then it updates the currentBatchID in the users table
        Parameters:
        params - a DownloadBatch_Params object which contains the username and password and the target project id
        Returns:
        the information of the batch and the related field, else a failed string if the operation fails for any reason

      • submitBatch

        public SubmitBatch_Result submitBatch(SubmitBatch_Params params)
        This method validates the user first then accesses the users table and unassigns the user from the submitted batch by incrementing the number of records indexed and updating the currentBatchID to the default value.
        Parameters:
        params - a SubmitBatch_id object which contains the user's name and password and batch ID and a 2d Array of strings which contain the field values for the batch.
        Returns:
        True if the operations succeeds, else a failed string

      • getFields

        public GetFields_Result getFields(GetFields_Params params)
        This method validates the user first then accesses the fields table and returns the information about the fields relating to the specified project. If not project is specified, returns information about all of the fields for all projects in the system.
        Parameters:
        params - a GetField_Params object which contains the user name and password and the project id
        Returns:
        the fields and their information, else a failed string if the operation fails for any reason

      • search

        public Search_Result search(Search_Params params)
        This method validates the user first then searches the indexed records for the specified strings in the specified fields. This is done by joining all the tables in the data base and accessing the resulting table
        Parameters:
        params - a Search_Params which contains the user name and password and a array of Strings which contains the fields, and another array of Strings which contains the the values to search for
        Returns:
        the batch id, image URL, record number and field id relating to the search, else a failed string if the operation fails for any reason.
